video.title: Gilmore Girls
video.synopsis: Fiercely independent single mom Lorelai raises gifted, Ivy League-bound daughter Rory amid a continual stream of quick-witted repartee.

episodes.synopsis: When Rory is accepted to attend a prestigious prep school, Lorelai must swallow her pride and ask her wealthy parents for help paying the tuition.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Rory's first day at Chilton doesn't go smoothly: First, Lorelai's attire offends Emily and the headmaster; then Rory meets some obnoxious classmates.
episodes.title: The Lorelais' First Day at Chilton

episodes.synopsis: When Rory and Richard bond during a day of golf at the club, Lorelai feels jealous of Rory's deepening connection with her grandparents.
episodes.title: Kill Me Now

episodes.synopsis: After Rory receives a bad grade on her English paper, Lorelai helps her cram for a big Shakespeare exam -- but catastrophe strikes on test day.
episodes.title: The Deer Hunters

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai admits she has feelings for someone. Meanwhile, Rory has a budding relationship of her own that is moving forward.
episodes.title: Cinnamon's Wake

episodes.synopsis: Rory clashes with Emily when Emily plans a formal birthday party for her. Meanwhile, Lorelai organizes a casual get-together to celebrate.
episodes.title: Rory's Birthday Parties

episodes.synopsis: Rory shares a romantic moment with Dean, but doesn't tell Lorelai. When Lorelai hears about it from Mrs. Kim, she invites Dean over for movie night.
episodes.title: Kiss and Tell

episodes.synopsis: Snow strands Rory at her grandparents' home, while Lorelai spends the day with her beau. Meanwhile, Lane misses Rory and comes to visit.
episodes.title: Love & War & Snow

episodes.synopsis: Rory attends her first dance with Dean but they get home late, causing Emily and Lorelai to fight over Lorelai's mothering skills.
episodes.title: Rory's Dance

episodes.synopsis: Misfortune strikes at the Gilmores' Christmas party. Dean assures Lorelai that nothing improper happened the night he and Rory fell asleep together.
episodes.title: Forgiveness and Stuff

episodes.synopsis: After Paris causes a scandal by exposing the relationship between a parent and a teacher, she is confronted.
episodes.title: Paris is Burning

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai goes on a hellish double date with Sookie, Jackson and Jackson's odd cousin. Meanwhile, Rory double dates with Dean, Lane and Dean's friend.
episodes.title: Double Date

episodes.synopsis: Trouble ensues when Rory takes her friends to a Bangles concert in New York. Lorelai learns something about Luke's romantic past.
episodes.title: Concert Interruptus

episodes.synopsis: Rory and Dean argue about women's roles after watching "The Donna Reed Show." Emily makes Lorelai face her feelings.
episodes.title: That Damn Donna Reed

episodes.synopsis: Rory's father returns, causing tension in Emily and Richard's house -- and forcing Lorelai to make a big decision about her family's future.
episodes.title: Christopher Returns

episodes.synopsis: Rory and Dean celebrate their three-month anniversary, but things don't go as planned. Luke's ex-girlfriend Rachel arrives in town.
episodes.title: Star-Crossed Lovers and Other Strangers

episodes.synopsis: After recent events, Rory keeps busy, refusing to give in to self-pity. Meanwhile, Stars Hollow's residents rally around her, much to her dismay.
episodes.title: The Breakup, Part II

episodes.synopsis: When Lorelai's grandmother offers a trust fund for Rory's education, Emily fears losing contact with a financially independent Lorelai and Rory.
episodes.title: The Third Lorelai

episodes.synopsis: Emily is horrified when she sees the place where Lorelai and Rory first lived, so she sets out to create a perfect bedroom for Rory in her house.
episodes.title: Emily in Wonderland

episodes.synopsis: Still upset over recent events, Rory becomes angry with Lorelai, who didn't tell her that she is dating again.
episodes.title: P.S. I Lo...

episodes.synopsis: Rory finally tells Dean the truth about how she feels about him. Sensing something between Lorelai and Luke, Rachel makes a decision.
episodes.title: Love, Daisies and Troubadours

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai makes a big decision, but when Emily hears about it from someone else, she's hurt and angry that Lorelai didn't bother to tell her.
episodes.title: Sadie, Sadie...

episodes.synopsis: Rory's sudden flurry of extracurricular activity strains her relationship with Dean. Emily is cold when Lorelai finally reveals her big news.
episodes.title: Hammers and Veils

episodes.synopsis: During a wild party, Lorelai impulsively calls someone, and their conversation gives her second thoughts about her plans.
episodes.title: Red Light on the Wedding Night

episodes.synopsis: With her big plans canceled, Lorelai is eager to escape the reactions of everyone in Stars Hollow, so she and Rory take off on a road trip.
episodes.title: The Road Trip to Harvard

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai tries to dissuade Luke from allowing his relative to live with him. Rory finds herself attracted to another boy.
episodes.title: Nick & Nora/Sid & Nancy

episodes.synopsis: Rory surprises everyone by agreeing to make her debut at a ball, and Lorelai finds herself attracted to a changed man.
episodes.title: Presenting Lorelai Gilmore

episodes.synopsis: Advised to become more social at Chilton, Rory winds up in the most popular school clique, while Lorelai helps with a fundraising fashion show.
episodes.title: Like Mother, Like Daughter

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai and Sookie have the first fight of their long friendship when Lorelai panics and decides their dream of opening an inn together will fail.
episodes.title: The Ins & Outs of Inns

episodes.synopsis: When Rory and her classmate Tristan are cast as Romeo and Juliet in a school play, a jealous Dean insists on attending every rehearsal.
episodes.title: Run Away Little Boy

episodes.synopsis: While Rory struggles to keep the budding rivalry between Dean and Jess under control, Lorelai invites most of Stars Hollow to an elaborate feast.
episodes.title: The Bracebridge Dinner

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai can't afford to repair her home's extensive termite damage but becomes angry when Rory involves Emily, who again offers Lorelai a loan.
episodes.title: Secrets and Loans

episodes.synopsis: Newly retired Richard is driving Emily crazy, so Lorelai agrees to take her father for a day in Stars Hollow, where he annoys both Lorelai and Rory.
episodes.title: Richard in Stars Hollow

episodes.synopsis: The annual Stars Hollow Picnic Basket Auction causes romantic complications when Jess outbids Dean to win a picnic lunch date with Rory.
episodes.title: A-Tisket, A-Tasket

episodes.synopsis: Christopher brings a visitor to Stars Hollow who wants to get to know Rory. Emily is furious that Lorelai isn't trying to win Christopher back.
episodes.title: It Should've Been Lorelai

episodes.synopsis: Rory panics when she realizes she's lost the bracelet Dean made for her. When Lorelai spots someone in Rory's room, she makes accusations of theft.
episodes.title: Lost & Found

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai and Emily's weekend at a spa doesn't go as planned. Meanwhile, Rory's night alone becomes difficult when Paris, Jess and Dean arrive.
episodes.title: There's the Rub

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai and Rory help out at the diner while Luke makes funeral arrangements. Emily goes overboard helping to plan a wedding.
episodes.title: Dead Uncles & Vegetables

episodes.synopsis: After helping Rory with her project for Chilton's annual business fair, Richard realizes he's tired of retirement and wants to start a second career.
episodes.title: Back in the Saddle Again

episodes.synopsis: As a favor to Luke, Rory tutors Jess, but during their first study session, Jess convinces Rory to go on a quick outing with him.
episodes.title: Teach Me Tonight

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai helps Richard establish a consulting business. Rory becomes angry that everyone blames Jess for what happened to her.
episodes.title: Help Wanted

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai is about to graduate from business school, so Rory secretly invites guests to her graduation ceremony. Rory makes a trip to New York.
episodes.title: Lorelai's Graduation Day

episodes.synopsis: On the day before the wedding, Lorelai enjoys a romantic evening. Meanwhile, Rory is thrilled when a familiar face returns to Stars Hollow.
episodes.title: I Can't Get Started

episodes.synopsis: Back from a summer internship in Washington, D.C., Rory finds herself torn between Dean and Jess. Meanwhile, Lorelai questions her future.
episodes.title: Lazy-Hazy-Crazy Days

episodes.synopsis: Emily's attempts to reunite Christopher with Lorelai and Rory result in an ugly confrontation between Rory and Christopher.
episodes.title: Haunted Leg

episodes.synopsis: After a Harvard application arrives, Rory and Lorelai seek advice. Meanwhile, Lane places an ad and becomes enamored with a respondent.
episodes.title: Application Anxiety

episodes.synopsis: Things get ugly when Lorelai speaks at the high school's career day. To rebel against her conservative mother, Lane does something drastic.
episodes.title: One's Got Class and the Other One Dyes

episodes.synopsis: After a disastrous date with a man she met at an auction organized by Emily, Lorelai tries to cancel the second date, despite her parents' objections.
episodes.title: Eight O'Clock at the Oasis

episodes.synopsis: When Lorelai winds up attending a social event with Rory, she learns more about Christopher's life than she wanted to know.
episodes.title: Take the Deviled Eggs...

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai forces Rory to be her partner at the Stars Hollow dance marathon, where Rory can't stop arguing with a boy -- and another definitely notices.
episodes.title: They Shoot Gilmores, Don't They?

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai, Rory, Richard and Emily visit Richard's alma mater, but Richard causes trouble by secretly making some arrangements in advance.
episodes.title: Let the Games Begin

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai and Rory have four Thanksgivings when they stop for celebrations with Lane, Sookie and Luke on the way to dinner with Richard and Emily.
episodes.title: A Deep-Fried Korean Thanksgiving

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai misses the town carnival when a visitor arrives. Rory's beau won't take her to the carnival -- until he learns she might go with another boy.
episodes.title: That'll Do, Pig

episodes.synopsis: A classmate convinces Paris that Rory has been plotting against her. Meanwhile, Emily is sued by a former maid, and Lorelai meets an interesting man.
episodes.title: I Solemnly Swear...

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai gets an angling lesson from Luke before her fishing date with her new beau. Meanwhile, the political battle between Rory and Paris escalates.
episodes.title: Lorelai Out of Water

episodes.synopsis: When Sherry goes into labor and asks Rory to stay with her at the hospital, Lorelai reminisces about the day Rory was born.
episodes.title: Dear Emily and Richard

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai goes away with her boyfriend for a weekend in New York, but she worries about leaving Rory and her boyfriend together.
episodes.title: Swan Song

episodes.synopsis: Tired of waiting for her boyfriend to call and make plans for the weekend, Rory goes to a hockey game with Lane, where she sees a familiar face.
episodes.title: Face-Off

episodes.synopsis: Rory and Paris compete to give a speech at a school celebration. Meanwhile, Lorelai shares a passionate kiss with someone unexpected.
episodes.title: The Big One

episodes.synopsis: When a meeting of the Edgar Allan Poe Society at her inn is interrupted by a disaster, Lorelai must find rooms for the guests at homes around town.
episodes.title: A Tale of Poes and Fire

episodes.synopsis: While Lorelai deals with the aftermath at the inn, Rory schemes to give her mom a special birthday party, complete with a gigantic surprise.
episodes.title: Happy Birthday, Baby

episodes.synopsis: Rory makes plans to attend the prom. Lane's rock band debuts at a big party, where longstanding animosities finally explode.
episodes.title: Keg! Max!

episodes.synopsis: After the brawl at her band's debut, Lane is in trouble with her mother. Later, Jess receives a visitor at the diner.
episodes.title: Say Goodnight, Gracie

episodes.synopsis: Jess travels across the country for a visit. Rory helps Emily choose an outfit for Rory's graduation, resulting in a conflict with Lorelai.
episodes.title: Here Comes the Son

episodes.synopsis: Rory and Lorelai prepare for Rory's graduation from Chilton. But major developments involving the inn threaten to dampen the festivities.
episodes.title: Those Are Strings, Pinocchio

episodes.synopsis: After returning from a summer of backpacking through Europe, Rory and Lorelai frantically prepare for Rory's move to college.
episodes.title: Ballrooms & Biscotti

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai helps Rory move into her dorm, where she meets an odd new roommate, and learns that she will also be sharing her room with a familiar face.
episodes.title: The Lorelais' First Day at Yale

episodes.synopsis: Emily redecorates Rory's dorm room without her permission. Lorelai and Sookie cater a kids' birthday party with a "Lord of the Rings" theme.
episodes.title: The Hobbit, the Sofa and Digger Stiles

episodes.synopsis: While visiting Stars Hollow for the weekend, Rory encounters Dean, who awkwardly invites her to an event the next day.
episodes.title: Chicken or Beef?

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai struggles to hide details of her life from Emily. Rory discovers that college dating isn't easy. Lorelai invites Luke over for movie night.
episodes.title: The Fundamental Things Apply

episodes.synopsis: Emily hires Lorelai and Sookie to cater an elaborate launch party for Richard's new company, but insists they prove that they are worthy of her trust.
episodes.title: An Affair to Remember

episodes.synopsis: Rory and Lorelai participate in a Stars Hollow event in which the townspeople dress up and present tableaux imitating famous paintings.
episodes.title: The Festival of Living Art

episodes.synopsis: Rory tries to spice up her articles for the student newspaper. Luke admits to Lorelai that he is revisiting a past relationship.
episodes.title: Die, Jerk

episodes.synopsis: Emily realizes that Richard has been secretly meeting someone for lunch for years. Lorelai accepts an invitation to dinner.
episodes.title: Ted Koppel's Big Night Out

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai and Sookie renovate their inn. Lorelai enjoys a romantic evening. Rory is irritated by Paris's new relationship.
episodes.title: The Nanny and the Professor

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai is upset that Luke has gotten an apartment in another town. Rory learns that a guy she likes has been spreading false information about her.
episodes.title: In the Clamor and the Clangor

episodes.synopsis: Luke is wary when his sister comes to town. Lorelai hesitates to tell her parents about her new beau. Paris's affair gets serious.
episodes.title: A Family Matter

episodes.synopsis: Rory crosses paths with Jess in Stars Hollow. Luke's sister visits Stars Hollow and introduces her new boyfriend to her brother.
episodes.title: Nag Hammadi Is Where They Found the Gnostic Gospels

episodes.synopsis: Overwhelmed by her classwork, Rory confides in Dean, who's working on the construction crew at the Dragonfly Inn.
episodes.title: The Incredible Sinking Lorelais

episodes.synopsis: Rory gets a glimpse of Dean's new life. When Lorelai and Rory spend a day at the mall, they run into Emily on a wild shopping spree.
episodes.title: Scene in a Mall

episodes.synopsis: Richard is devastated by a sudden loss. Emily receives a shock when she finds an old letter that was written to Richard.
episodes.title: The Reigning Lorelai

episodes.synopsis: Rory and Paris head south for their first spring break in Florida, where they run into a couple of their old pals from Chilton.
episodes.title: Girls in Bikinis, Boys Doin' the Twist

episodes.synopsis: Jason and Richard are sued. Rory is upset by a decision Dean has made. Dean is told to stop spending time with Rory.
episodes.title: Tick, Tick, Tick Boom

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai confronts her father when she learns that he has cut business ties. Luke gives Lorelai an update on his love life.
episodes.title: Afterboom

episodes.synopsis: A self-help tape helps a depressed Luke realize who his soul mate is. Lorelai is stressed as the Dragonfly Inn's opening day approaches.
episodes.title: Luke Can See Her Face

episodes.synopsis: Jess walks his mother down the aisle at her Renaissance-themed wedding. Luke asks his new love interest on a date. Dean confides in Rory.
episodes.title: Last Week Fights, This Week Tights

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai invites friends and family to do a test run of the Dragonfly Inn opening. Two suitors pursue Lorelai.
episodes.title: Raincoats & Recipes

episodes.synopsis: Rory and Lorelai argue about a choice Rory made. Lorelai is happy in her new relationship. Emily and Rory plan to take a European trip.
episodes.title: Say Goodbye to Daisy Miller

episodes.synopsis: After Rory apologizes to Lorelai, she sends a letter from Europe, which has unintended consequences. Meanwhile, Luke returns home.
episodes.title: A Messenger, Nothing More

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai is a little offended that no one cares about her new relationship -- until it becomes a topic of heated discussion at the town meeting.
episodes.title: Written in the Stars

episodes.synopsis: Rory and Dean meet alone to discuss where they stand with each other. Lorelai and Sookie manage Jackson's campaign for a town office.
episodes.title: Tippecanoe and Taylor, Too

episodes.synopsis: Wanting to smooth over her relationship with Dean, Lorelai suggests a night out with Luke and Rory -- but the evening goes awry.
episodes.title: We Got Us a Pippi Virgin

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai and Sookie are thrilled when a cultural icon starts frequenting the Dragonfly Inn dining room. Rory discovers an intriguing secret society.
episodes.title: Norman Mailer, I'm Pregnant

episodes.synopsis: Logan takes Rory to a mysterious and elaborate event. After discovering that Lorelai has a new beau, Emily and Richard spend time with him.
episodes.title: You Jump, I Jump, Jack

episodes.synopsis: When Emily and Richard throw a party to introduce Rory to their alumni friends, she has a realization about her boyfriend.
episodes.title: The Party's Over

episodes.synopsis: Rory and Lorelai plan to convince Richard and Emily to reconcile, but Emily dashes their hopes by making a bold announcement.
episodes.title: Emily Says 'Hello'

episodes.synopsis: Rory hosts a high school student who's considering the same university, but things don't go as planned. Lorelai and her beau have their first fight.
episodes.title: But Not As Cute As Pushkin

episodes.synopsis: When Christopher visits Rory at college, she rejects his attempt at reconciliation. Lorelai consoles him but doesn't tell her boyfriend where she was.
episodes.title: Women of Questionable Morals

episodes.synopsis: Rory offers to help Logan write an article. When Richard sees Emily talking to a man she dated, he has an explosive reaction.
episodes.title: Come Home

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai and Rory throw Emily a party. Richard and Emily recommit to their marriage. Rory tells Logan what she wants from him.
episodes.title: Wedding Bell Blues

episodes.synopsis: After the disastrous scene at her parents' recent social event, Lorelai begs her boyfriend not to give up on their relationship.
episodes.title: Say Something

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai is upset about the recent turn of events. Luke builds sets for the elementary school play in hopes of seeing the costume designer.
episodes.title: Jews and Chinese Food

episodes.synopsis: Richard and Emily return from their second honeymoon. Miserable Luke burns food and handles complaining customers by throwing them out of the diner.
episodes.title: So...Good Talk

episodes.synopsis: Rory regrets agreeing with her beau to date other people. Lorelai reunites with her boyfriend but remains cold toward Emily.
episodes.title: Pulp Friction

episodes.synopsis: Luke helps turn an old house into a museum. Lorelai says too much during an interview about the inn. Rory, Paris and Lane have boyfriend trouble.
episodes.title: To Die and Let Diorama

episodes.synopsis: When Rory tells her beau she can't have a casual relationship with him, he gives her an unexpected response. Sookie finds herself confined to her bed.
episodes.title: But I'm a Gilmore

episodes.synopsis: Rory begins her internship at one of Logan's father's newspapers. Emily and Richard fawn over Rory's boyfriend, but Lorelai is not as impressed.
episodes.title: How Many Kropogs to Cape Cod?

episodes.synopsis: Rory is surprised by the performance review she receives from Logan's father. Luke's plan to buy the Twickham house is threatened by a competing bid.
episodes.title: Blame Booze and Melville

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai rescues Rory after a night of reckless behavior. Shocked to hear her daughter's plans for the future, she turns to Luke for help.
episodes.title: A House is Not a Home

episodes.synopsis: Luke responds to Lorelai. Rory faces legal consquences. Angry with Rory, Richard and Emily, Lorelai cuts off ties with them.
episodes.title: New and Improved Lorelai

episodes.synopsis: Rory winds up in a fight while performing community service. Lorelai gets a dog. Luke and Lorelai decide to renovate Lorelai's house.
episodes.title: Fight Face

episodes.synopsis: Rory takes a job at Emily's Daughters of the American Revolution office and serves as her grandmother's spy. Lorelai won't commit to a date.
episodes.title: The Ungraduate

episodes.synopsis: Sookie hopes to reconcile the estranged Gilmore girls by asking both Lorelai and Rory to be godparents to her kids, but things don't go as planned.
episodes.title: Always a Godmother, Never a God

episodes.synopsis: After two separate confrontations with the Huntzbergers at a D.A.R. party, Richard and Emily realize Lorelai was right about their treatment of Rory.
episodes.title: We've Got Magic to Do

episodes.synopsis: After asking Logan about Rory's future plans, Richard admits it was a mistake to let Rory make rash decisions and discusses the matter with Lorelai.
episodes.title: Welcome to the Dollhouse

episodes.synopsis: Both Lorelai and Rory are saddened that their estrangement will keep them from spending Rory's 21st birthday the way they had always planned.
episodes.title: Twenty-One is the Loneliest Number

episodes.synopsis: When her former boyfriend visits and reveals an amazing success, Rory begins rethinking the choices she's made with her life.
episodes.title: Let Me Hear Your Balalaikas Ringing Out

episodes.synopsis: After months of estrangement, Lorelai and Rory make their first move toward reconciliation. Luke gets a big surprise but conceals it from Lorelai.
episodes.title: The Prodigal Daughter Returns

episodes.synopsis: Rory's long-absent father reappears in her and Lorelai's lives, casting uncertainty on what this will mean for Lorelai's current relationship.
episodes.title: He's Slippin' 'Em Bread ... Dig?

episodes.synopsis: Wanting to get to know his newly discovered relative, Luke makes a visit. Lorelai sets a date but has a feeling something's not right.
episodes.title: The Perfect Dress

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai finds out about Luke's secret, but not from Luke. She tries to be supportive, but Luke's reaction hurts her. Logan tries to win over Rory.
episodes.title: Just Like Gwen and Gavin

episodes.synopsis: Luke gets to know April. Rory tries to get the school newspaper published after the staff quits. All four Gilmores vent their frustrations.
episodes.title: Friday Night's Alright for Fighting

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai brings Luke to dinner with her parents. When Rory becomes the new editor of the school paper, her roommate kicks her out of their apartment.
episodes.title: You've Been Gilmored

episodes.synopsis: Rory, Lorelai and their beaus spend Valentine's Day weekend on Martha's Vineyard. During their stay, Rory's boyfriend saves the day.
episodes.title: A Vineyard Valentine

episodes.synopsis: Rory dazzles the crowd at a journalism panel, but the next day, she's devastated to learn how her boyfriend behaved during their breakup.
episodes.title: Bridesmaids Revisited

episodes.synopsis: Rory forgives her beau. Luke's girlfriend is secretly upset when he spends a few days with April. Rory does some spying on her mother's behalf.
episodes.title: I'm OK, You're OK

episodes.synopsis: Unhappy because Rory hasn't really forgiven him, Logan takes off with his friends. Rory runs into Luke and April at a bookstore in Philadelphia.
episodes.title: The Real Paul Anka

episodes.synopsis: After she and her mother scramble to accommodate an unexpected visitor, Lane takes a big step in her life. Lorelai gives in to self-pity.
episodes.title: I Get a Sidekick out of You

episodes.synopsis: When Luke plans a birthday party for April at the diner, Lorelai wants to help and is hurt that Luke thinks it's too soon for her to meet April.
episodes.title: Super Cool Party People

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai helps Emily while she's unable to see after minor eye surgery. Rory takes charge of Logan's recovery when he returns home.
episodes.title: Driving Miss Gilmore

episodes.synopsis: Rory throws a graduation party for Logan, but their time together is bittersweet. Lorelai delivers an ultimatum to Luke.
episodes.title: Partings

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai is mortified when she wakes up with an unexpected bedfellow. Rory is puzzled by Logan's going-away present.
episodes.title: The Long Morrow

episodes.synopsis: Rory is upset when she has to cancel a long-planned trip to Asia, so Lorelai turns her house into an Asian-themed wonderland.
episodes.title: That's What You Get, Folks, For Makin' Whoopie

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai realizes her parents aren't as terrible as she thought. Rory's long-distance relationship proves to be a struggle.
episodes.title: Lorelai's First Cotillion

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai is having trouble fully committing to her current relationship. A relative comes to stay with Luke.
episodes.title: 'S Wonderful, 'S Marvelous

episodes.synopsis: Rory is thrilled when her beau comes to town on business but realizes during a dinner with his colleagues that she has no connection to his new world.
episodes.title: The Great Stink

episodes.synopsis: Christopher treats Rory's college newspaper co-workers to lunch, but the meal ends abruptly when Rory insists they cover a breaking story.
episodes.title: Go Bulldogs!

episodes.synopsis: Christopher and Lorelai take Gigi to visit Sherry. Rory's tenure as editor-in-chief of the university newspaper comes to an end.
episodes.title: French Twist

episodes.synopsis: Rory initially pretends to be thrilled about Lorelai's announcement, but later lets her mother know how upset she is when they're alone.
episodes.title: Introducing Lorelai Planetarium

episodes.synopsis: Christopher's well-intentioned gesture at Stars Hollow's knit-a-thon brings the event to an early end.
episodes.title: Knit, People, Knit

episodes.synopsis: When Christopher witnesses a sweet moment between a couple, he becomes concerned about his partner's commitment to him.
episodes.title: Merry Fisticuffs

episodes.synopsis: Luke asks Lorelai to write a character reference letter for his court case. Lorelai, Christopher and Rory have a late but extravagant Christmas.
episodes.title: Santa's Secret Stuff

episodes.synopsis: Sookie acts strangely. Luke attends his court case hearing. Lorelai is confronted about the character reference letter she wrote for Luke.
episodes.title: To Whom It May Concern

episodes.synopsis: During a family emergency, Lorelai can't reach Christopher. Meanwhile, Logan and Luke drop everything to support Rory, Lorelai, Richard and Emily.
episodes.title: I'd Rather Be in Philadelphia

episodes.synopsis: Rory has a crush on the teacher filling in for Richard. Christopher and Lorelai talk about their current relationship with each other.
episodes.title: Farewell, My Pet

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai helps Emily organize domestic affairs but has trouble revealing the current state of her love life. Rory attends a birthday dinner for Logan.
episodes.title: I'm a Kayak, Hear Me Roar

episodes.synopsis: Rory has an interview. Lorelai must settle a fight between Lane and her mother. Logan reveals a failure to Rory.
episodes.title: Will You Be My Lorelai Gilmore?

episodes.synopsis: Lorelai, Rory and Emily go on a road trip to attend the wedding of an old friend. Someone makes a surprise appearance, asking Rory to forgive him.
episodes.title: Gilmore Girls Only

episodes.synopsis: Rory shows her boyfriend around Stars Hollow, while Lorelai worries he's too irresponsible. Lorelai and Luke admit they both made mistakes.
episodes.title: Hay Bale Maze

episodes.synopsis: After an awkward encounter, Lorelai and Luke start fighting, which Lorelai takes as a good sign. Rory gets a letter that impacts her future plans.
episodes.title: It's Just Like Riding a Bike

episodes.synopsis: Rory has a scary dream about what lies ahead for her. A visitor discusses Rory's future with Lorelai. Lorelai pours her heart out on karaoke night.
episodes.title: Lorelai? Lorelai?

episodes.synopsis: Emily and Richard host a graduation party for Rory. Lorelai and Christopher are relieved to find they can still be friends. Logan surprises Rory.
episodes.title: Unto the Breach

episodes.synopsis: In this series finale, Rory makes a sudden change in her summer plans, and Luke enlists everyone in Stars Hollow to throw her a farewell party.
episodes.title: Bon Voyage
